name: Azumi
description: Azumi PS2 is a tie in to the manga series by Yu Koyama: Azumi. Developed by Gargoyle Mechanics and published by D3, take the role of Azumi: a young woman raised in a family of assassins as you have one objective in your existence: to eradicate the warlords that exist in their attempt to destroy the newfound peace of Feudal Japan
